info.title: Routegy API
info.description:
Welcome to the Routegy API docs!

These documents include both the Management API and the Public API.

For more information, be sure to check out our documentation website at <https://docs.routegy.com>.

externalDocs.description: Find out more at our docs website

get.summary: Get touchpoint from a code short id

get.description:
Get code by its ID. 

 Check out the [Topic: Code](https://docs.routegy.com/topic/codes/) and [Reference: Code](https://docs.routegy.com/reference/codes/) pages for more information.

min_created_at.name: min_created_at
min_created_at.description: Include results with 'created_at' value greater than or equal to this value.

max_created_at.name: max_created_at
max_created_at.description: Include results with 'created_at' value less than or equal to this value.

min_updated_at.name: min_updated_at
min_updated_at.description: Include results with 'updated_at' value greater than or equal to this value.

max_updated_at.name: max_updated_at
max_updated_at.description: Include results with 'updated_at' value less than or equal to this value.

slug.name: slug
slug.description: Include results with 'slug' value that contain this value (case insensitive).

slug_regex.name: slug_regex
slug_regex.description: Include results with 'slug' value that match this regex value.

name.name: name
name.description: Include results with 'name' value that contain this value (case insensitive).

name_regex.name: name_regex
name_regex.description: Include results with 'name' value that match this regex value.

email.name: email
email.description: Include results with 'email' value that contain this value (case insensitive).

email_regex.name: email_regex
email_regex.description: Include results with 'email' value that match this regex value.

order_by.name: order_by
order_by.description: Field to use when ordering the results.

cursor.name: cursor
cursor.description: Pagination cursor value to retrieve the next page.
